title: Settings
description: Manage selected team preferences, update its information, manage members, and configure the simulator.

settings.teamInfoDesc: Modify the team name, image, and description.
settings.membersDesc: Manage team members: invite or remove.

members.title: Members Settings
members.description: Manage team members: invite new participants or remove existing ones.
members.adminSectionDesc: The professor or leader responsible for this team.
members.classmatesSectionDesc: List of other students in this team.
members.studentsListDesc: Manage access for currently enrolled students.
members.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to remove this member?
members.noClassmates: There are no other classmates in this team.

deleteMember.title: Remove Member
deleteMember.message: Are you sure you want to remove {{name}} from this team?

simulator.title: Simulator Settings
simulator.description: Adjust simulator parameters and behaviors according to team needs.

sections.marketBasicsDesc: Configure initial and fundamental simulator parameters.
sections.marketParamsDesc: Adjust general market behavior and its main dynamics.
sections.tradingRulesDesc: Define limits and conditions under which participants can trade.
sections.marketEventsDesc: Control the occurrence and impact of unexpected events within the simulator.

settings.initialCashDesc: Define the amount of money participants will start with in the simulator.
settings.currencyDesc: Select the currency used for all transactions within the simulator.
settings.marketVolatilityDesc: Determine the frequency and amplitude of asset price changes.
settings.marketLiquidityDesc: Control how easy it is to buy or sell assets without significantly affecting their prices.
settings.thickSpeedDesc: Adjust the speed at which changes and events are processed within the simulated market.
settings.transactionFeeDesc: Set the cost for each operation performed by participants.
settings.eventFrequencyDesc: Determine the quantity and regularity of unexpected events affecting the market.
settings.dividendImpactDesc: Define how dividends affect asset prices within the simulator.
settings.crashImpactDesc: Configure the severity of sudden and sharp market drops.
settings.allowShortSellingDesc: Enable or disable the ability to sell assets that participants do not own.
